name: The Grappler
description:
INFORMATION

This is a prototype made with the purpose of testing a base mechanic in my upcoming survival game "The Platform" that will be released soon.

Please provide feedback, tell us how you enjoyed this mechanic and feel free to share with us any suggestions you have.

Install instructions
  1. Click "Download Now" button.
  2. Extract the files by right clicking the downloaded file  and choosing extract here. Make sure the .exe file and Data folder is in the same location.
  3. Run the .exe file.

Discord Server: https://discord.gg/BQnJ9uBTaY
